page.title: 16LOCAL ISSUES
page.content: IN THE FIRST WEEK OF JUNE WORK BEGAN ON REPAIRS TO THE VILLAGE CHURCH. THE COST OF IT WILL BE Â£1O,OOO. THE MONEY WILL HAVE TO BE RAISED - A GIFT DAY WILL BE HELD IN AID OF THE CHURCH REPAIRS. THERE WAS ALSO AN ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING TO DECIDE WHETHER THERE WAS ENOUGH SUPPORT TO FORM A FOOTBALL YOUTH TEAM. IT WAS DECIDED THAT IF THERE WAS ENOUGH SUPPORT A YOUTH TEAM WOULD BE FORMED. THERE WILL BE A MEETING IN THE NEAR FUTURE TO SEE IF PARENTS WILL GIVE THEIR SUPPORT. A QUESTION WAS ASKED BY THE PARISH COUNCIL ON 1ST JUNE 1985, IS THERE A NEED FOR A BUS SHELTER IN HIGH STREET? THE BUS SHELTER HAS BEEN DAMAGED AND IS UNSAFE TO USE. THE PARISH COUNCIL HAVE NOT MADE A DECISION ABOUT WHAT TO DO WITH THE BUS SHELTER.
